integration_patterns: Secure data exchange via X12 EDI

evidence.claim: Enter Health uses AWS services for cloud infrastructure and deployment.
Enter Health complies with HIPAA regulations for handling health data.
The platform supports FHIR standards for health data interoperability.
Integration patterns include X12 EDI for insurance claims processing.
Kafka is utilized for data streaming between services.

icp.icp_reason: Company focuses on API integration for healthcare data exchange using X12 and HIPAA standards.
